txt.en: You had an idea to collect weapons for the destitute band of outcasts hiding on the far side of the river.

As with most evil Men, the Dunlending raider you killed bore a cruel weapon -- in this case, a dagger.\n\nIt would actually benefit the small clan of destitute outcasts to have weapons such as these. You should collect more and give them to the friendlier Dunlendings.

Daggers, bows, spears, and shields can be found on the various Dunlending-scouts who roam the northern fields of the Herd-lands in Trum Dreng.\n\nYou should defeat the Dragon-clan invaders and collect their weapons to give to the small band of trapped Dunlendings.

'You gathered these weapons for us? That was a generous gesture....\n\n'We have some hope of getting out of here alive now, thanks to this. You are very kind, [placeholder]. I did not expect a Duvodiad to help us.'

Ceri can be found on the overlook to the north of the Herd-lands.\n\nYou should bring the weapons you gathered to the small group of hiding Dunlendings, which will help them be better prepared for the troubles they will face upon their escape.
Bring the weapons you gathered to Ceri
